attributes.additional_details:
NCS has impacted most teenagers life in a very positive way it has created many mutual bonds between teenagers and through NCS many young people from different backgrounds come together with different purposes which equip teenagers with new skills and through NCS confidence level of teenagers has increased drastically why stop the funding of such A great program?
The program also helps reduce crime levels by allowing teenagers to realise happiness can be created naturally
attributes.background:
Improve or increase the funding of NCS
Introduce more activities

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Save the National Citizens Service: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701592
